member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#EDocument#Digital Voucher Check.CheckVoucherIsAttachedToDocument(Codeunit::System#Utilities#Error Message Management@,Enum::Microsoft#EServices#EDocument#Digital Voucher Entry Type,RecordRef)
member.summary: Checks if the voucher is attached to the document.
member.param: An instance of the Error Message Mgt. codeunit to add error if voucher is not attached.
A type entry associated with the document.
A record reference of the document.

member.summary: Generate voucher and attach to the posted document.
